divs: Sighting Detailsbegan at 2:05 p.m. ended 2:07 p.m. sounds like metal hard to decsribe closest is a satelite? got louder and louder, my 5 year old had to cover her ears i did not i tryed to listened, it was not a radio, no music.It was grinding metal with slight static high notes enlongated notes and then low, it was repetative? Called my neighbor but he was not watching t.v.
